coursetoc.name: Integration
coursetoc.preview_text:
This course is intended for specialists involved in developing web sites based on Bitrix Site Manager.

The course provides a detailed description of the system integration in a new or existing web site. Also the course includes consideration of the templates management process.
coursetoc.description:
Lecturer: Valyanov Dmitry
Company: Bitrix, Inc
Position: Technical Support Service Manager

This course is intended for specialists involved in developing web sites based on the Bitrix Site Manager 5.0. The course includes a detailed consideration of the following questions:

  • site templates management;
  • work with include areas;
  • work with advertising areas;
  • site structure management;
  • work with the site navigation tools: menu and navigation chain;
  • basic principles of the product localization;
  • visual components management;
  • site optimization.

The course assumes that the web developer is closely acquainted with such web building technologies as HTML, CSS, PHP.

Studying the course allows specialists to get knowledge necessary for developing web sites based on Bitrix Site Manager 5.0 and implementing the system integration in existing web sites.
